Model

Class WebCrawler

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • Model.WebCrawler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, IOriginator

    public class WebCrawler
extends java.util.Observable
implements IOriginator, java.io.Serializable
    This class is responsible for creating our WebCrawler model based on the implemented MyDigraph class, where the vertices are represented by the concrete web page (class WebPage) and the parts by a link on page (class Link).
    Author:
    BRKsCosta and danielcordeiro
    See Also:
    Link, WebPage, Serialized Form
